name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Exfiltration Incident
description: This playbook details the response steps for an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive files. The workflow addresses immediate threats and implements alerting mechanisms for future occurrences.

action--90c720d7-4a82-4fd6-8e45-2c8373c8.description: Terminate the running malicious PowerShell process identified as the script executor.

action--51e5d8b5-5f34-4783-9838-37178477.description: Conduct a forensic analysis on host-22 to gather more information regarding the incident.

action--e47b44e6-5dfa-4b95-be93-3c9ae5d6.description: Configure the alerting system to notify when more scripts are executed within a specified threshold.
